name: Total Development Area
query:
SELECT
    `tabBuildings`.building_address as "Building Address",
    `tabBuildings`.building_name as "Building Name",
    `tabLand Details`.land_plot_number as "Land Plot number",
    `tabLand Details`.land_address as "Land Address",
    `tabBuildings`.land_size_in_sq_ft as "Building Size (In Sq. ft)",
    `tabBuildings`.building_valuation_in_rs as "Building Valuation (In Rs.)",
    `tabBuildings`.post_office as "Post Office",
    `tabBuildings`.block as "Block",
    `tabBuildings`.district as "District",
    `tabBuildings`.state as "State",
    `tabBuildings`.pin_code as "Pin Code",
    `tabBuildings`.building_on_lease as "Building on Lease",
    `tabBuildings`.building_type as "Building Type",
    `tabBuildings`.total_rooms as "Total Rooms",
    `tabBuildings`.total_floors as "Total Floors",
    `tabBuildings`.facing as "Facing",
    `tabBuildings`.campus as "Campus"
FROM 
    `tabBuildings` 
JOIN 
    `tabLand Details`
ON
    `tabBuildings`.name = `tabLand Details`.parent;
